article_title: New Study Says Obamacare Will Boost Consumer Medical Device Market To $10 Billion

article_metadata.description: The consumer medical device market, from pedometers and personal scales to blood glucose monitors and cholesterol meters, will surpass $10 billion by 2017 globally thanks to aging baby boomers, chronic conditions and the Affordable Care Act, according to a new report from information firm IHS. (Photo credit: Wikipedia) As baby boomers [...]
